Description:
About the job:We are looking for a Qualified and experienced Systems Engineer to design, install, and configure, servers\systems in an enterprise hosting environment.Design and implement architecture for Microsoft Hyper-V, VMWare, VMM, SCOM, Azure Pack, and Microsoft Exchange. 
Implement and support highly available setup for Microsoft Hyper-V cluster.Skills
Skills:
Certifications strongly desired (MCSA, MCSE, Azure, Office 365).
Having a good knowledge of Veeam and Networker Backup software is a plus.
Participate in on-call off-hours support rotation. 24/7 support of servers and systems.
A proven ability to troubleshoot and resolve Systems problems.
Installation, and management of VMware vSphere-based infrastructures.
Excellent knowledge of vCenter administration and management
Have good knowledge of the Upgrade of ESX and Vcenter
Working experience building scalable, highly available, mission-critical virtual infrastructures
Excellent knowledge in implementing, and configuration of VMware networking (Standard and VDS switches)
Experience Needed From 0 to 2 years of experience.
Strong knowledge of the following Microsoft technologies:

Virtual Machine Manager “VMM”
System Center Family “SCOM – SCCM ..etc”
Microsoft Azure Pack
Microsoft Exchange (2013, 2016, 2019)
Office 365, AAD, Exchange Online
